column5: Well I used some advice from some people here on hair rigs and some bollies. I ended up with 2 nice carp this morning. My first U.S. carp. Put up a great fight.
HA HA!  American carps are just as pretty as Canadian Carps.  Nice catch.
Congrats man! Got some weight on those fish too!  Love the 2nd shot.
Yep!  Hair rigs and boilies rule....LOL.  Great stuff and nice fish!
Good stuff Matt, but by the way you're dressed one would think you were still up here in Ontario  Maureen
